name: 知心 —心理健康智能体平台
description: Zhi Xin (知心) is an intelligent mental health platform providing comprehensive support. For individuals, it offers a caring AI companion that generates personalized advice and uplifting comic stories. For supporters (schools, families, volunteers), it provides a unique training module with virtual patients to practice and improve supportive communication skills. Whether you're seeking comfort or looking to help others, Zhi Xin offers a path toward greater emotional well-being.
